newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenya c.bank sells 11 bln shillings in T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Kenya c.bank sells 11 bln shillings in T-bills.

text.p: The Central Bank of Kenya sold 11.180 billion shillings of treasury bills at the weekly auction, bank officials said on Thursday.
The bank sold 11.052 billion shillings worth of bills in the 91-day category at an average yield of 20.298 percent, compared to 5.135 billion shillings at 20.398 percent last week.
In the 28-day category, the bank sold 128 million shillings at an unchanged yield of 16.500 percent. Last week, only 13 million shillings were sold in the same category.
The bank invited tenders for T-bills worth eight billion shillings for next week's auction on Thursday.
